code: import React from"react";import"./App.css";import assetsVolume from"./data/assetsVolume";import{assets}from"./data/data";import useExchange from"./data/useExchange";import depositsInterest from"./data/depositsInterest";var App=function App(){var rates=useExchange();var total=Object.keys(assets).map(function(item){return assetsVolume(assets[item],rates);}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item;},0);var totalUAH=total*rates.UAH;var interest=depositsInterest();return React.createElement("div",{className:"App"},isNaN(total)?"Loading...":"".concat(totalUAH.toFixed(2)," UAH"),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("br",null),interest.toFixed(2)," UAH");};export default React.memo(App);
